EmailTemplate.name: 2020.11.09 - BS - Backorder EN.Backorder EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Backorder Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for your patience while your product(s) is temporarily on backorder. In an effort to serve you better, we may have suggestions for alternative products. If you would like to hear about these other available solutions, please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Backorder-Form-EN.html]]>.
